record.field: <data> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="end_date"]" position="after"> <newline/> <label name="line1"/> <field name="line1"/> <label name="line2"/> <field name="line2"/> <newline/> <label name="line3"/> <field name="line3"/> </xpath> <xpath expr="/form/label[@name="siret"]" position="replace"/> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="siret"]" position="replace"/> <xpath expr="/form/label[@name="siret_nic"]" position="replace"/> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="siret_nic"]" position="replace"/> </data>
